stimulusHtml: Consider the series ∑ n=1 ∞ e n n! MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40F1@ . If the ratio test is applied to the series, which of the following inequalities results, implying that the series converges?
choicesHtml: lim n → ∞ e n ! < 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4245@

lim n→∞ n! e <1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4245@

lim n→∞ n+1 e <1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@433D@

lim n→∞ e n+1 <1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@433D@

lim n→∞ e ( n+1 )! <1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@458A@
